metadata.title: CVE-2019-7548 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - low
metadata.description:
SQLAlchemy 1.2.17 has SQL Injection when the group_by parameter can becontrolled.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-7548` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-sqlalchemy - 1.2.18+ds1-2ubuntu1
python3-sqlalchemy-ext - 1.2.18+ds1-2ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: sqlalchemy package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.2.18+ds1-2ubuntu1').
